name: It's a feature!
description:
It's a feature! Is a project made for the Finnish College Jam event.  It depicts a game that was left unfinished by its creators, and the player must bend the rules a bit to be able to finish it

Highvolume warning.

"Credits" and "Controls" in the main menu softlock the game. 

Yea we kinda ran out of time, so no ending yet.

Timo Hyvärinen, Tuomas Ratinen, Leo Leerilä
